Entries.companionRejected: I think I'll just stick with my books and video games, sorry.$2
Entries.companionRejectedNight: I've had a long day. I'm not really up for an adventure right now.$0
Entries.companionDismiss: Sure thing.$0#$b#I'll see you later, ok?$3
Entries.companionDismissAuto: I think I'm going to head home and log some of this data I collected today.$0#$b#Have a good one, @!$3
Entries.companionRecruited: Where should we go?$6#$b#If I knew we were going out I could've written up an itinerary beforehand.$2
Entries.companionSuggest: We can go check out the bridges together.#$q -1 -1#Would you like to come with me, @?#$r -1 0 Yes#Let's go check them out, Victor.#$r -1 0 No#I don't have time, maybe another day.
Entries.companionSuggest_No: Okay, @. We can go check them out another day.
Entries.companion_ShearwaterBridge: It's an incredible sight, isn't it?.$3#b#Thanks to this bridge, people from Grampleton and Stardew Valley are able to work and grow together.$1
